sentence.Network_en: The doves were cooing in the trees.
A clear split over tactics appears to be emerging between doves and hawks in the party.
sentence.Network_cn: 党内鸽派和鹰派在策略上似乎将要出现明显的分歧。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Jn . 2 : 16 And to those who were selling the doves He said , Take these things away from here ; do not make My Father's house a house of merchandise .约二16又对卖鸽子的说，把这些东西从这里拿走，不要将我父的家，当作买卖的场所。
flowers appear on the earth ; the season of singing has come cooing of doves is heard in our land .地上百花开放。百鸟呜叫的时候（或作修理葡萄树的时候)已经来到，斑鸠的声音在我们境内也听见了。
I would love to raise doves and plant an olive tree .我想养一只鸽子种一棵橄榄树。
on the eighth day he must take two doves or two young pigeons and come before the LORD to the entrance to the Tent of Meeting and give them to the priest .第八天，要取两只斑鸠或是两只雏鸽，来到会幕门口，耶和华面前，把鸟交给祭司。

他的旧居鸽屋（Dove Cottage），座落在格拉斯米尔湖旁。不远处，是专为他成立的一个博物馆。

encyclopedia.content: doves的成长 自1998年年底出道以来，Doves似乎一直摆脱不了和the Verve、Radiohead等团相提并论的命运，这一点可能跟他们都是九0年代窜起的摇滚乐团，以及他们作品都带著点忧郁的气质有关。从另外一个角度来看，这样的比较也相对地显示出Doves具有和这些英式摇滚代表团体相匹敌的实力。这支与许多九十年代出道的英国摇滚团体一样、来自曼彻斯特的三人组合，原本来自于一个舞曲团体Sub Sub，该团的“Ain’t No Love(Ain’t No Use)

entry.def: A dove is a bird that looks like a pigeon but is smaller and lighter in colour. Doves are often used as a symbol of peace.
In politics, you can refer to people who support the use of peaceful methods to solve difficult situations as doves .

example.ex: A clear split over tactics appears to be emerging between doves and hawks in the party.
example.tran: 党内鸽派和鹰派在策略上似乎将要出现明显的分歧。

entry.tran: （美国英语中有时用作 dive 的过去式）
entry.def: In American English, dove is sometimes used as the past tense of dive.
